mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_info( admin_idx, registered_date, person_in_charge, contact_number ) VALUES ( #{idx}, now(), #{personInChargeName}, #{contactNumber} )
mapper.select: select ad.id, ad.idx, auth.password from admin ad left join admin_authentication auth on auth.admin_idx = ad.idx where ad.id = #{userName};
